levels.help:
---------------------------------------- - Some help how to design a level - ----------------------------------------
" " or "." - Space "*" - Brick
"A" - Player start position. Only the first counts. There also "B", "C", and "D" which works. Originally it used to be used for change the player facing (rot. arond +Z)
Goal bricks - determines which face shold be on the bottom of the cube. The coloring of the cube equals the classic Rubik's cube. "1" - White face (Top) "2" - Yellow face (Bottom) "3" - Orange face (Back) "4" - Red face (Front) "5" - Blue face (Right) "6" - Green face (Left) "X" - Joker (Any face)
Anything else will be ignored. One level should not bigger than 128x128 unit. Anything above will ignored.
